SEARCH
Package fr.lirmm.chocominer.api.services.parameterbuilders

Class ParameterBuilder

java.lang.Object
fr.lirmm.chocominer.api.services.parameterbuilders.ParameterBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParameterBuilderInterface
@Service public class ParameterBuilder extends Object implements ParameterBuilderInterface
Class used to build concrete parameter values to build concrete data mining constraints out of the ConstraintParameter class.

  • Constructor Details

      public ParameterBuilder()

  • Method Details

    • buildParameters

      public Object[] buildParameters(Parameter[] methodParameters, List<ConstraintParameter<?>> constraintParameters) throws UndefinedConstraintParameterException, NotEnoughParametersException
      Builds an array of concrete values needed by the provided method parameters. These concrete values are extracted from a list of constraint parameters (ConstraintParameter). These values will be used to class methods to build concrete data mining constraints. (AbstractConstraint, SolvingStrategyInterface.
      Specified by:
      buildParameters in interface ParameterBuilderInterface
      Parameters:
      methodParameters - An array of method parameters representing the expected parameters for the data mining constraint.
      constraintParameters - A list of ConstraintParameter<?> representing the input parameters for the data mining constraint.
      Returns:
      An array of concrete values for the data mining constraint parameters.
      Throws:
      UndefinedConstraintParameterException - If a required constraint parameter is not defined.
      NotEnoughParametersException - If there are not enough provided constraint parameters for the given method parameters.

    • parameterIsDefined

      public boolean parameterIsDefined(List<ConstraintParameter<?>> constraintParameters, String methodParameterName)
      Checks if a given parameter name is defined in the list of ConstraintParameter<?>.
      Parameters:
      constraintParameters - A list of ConstraintParameter<?> representing the input parameters for the data mining constraint.
      methodParameterName - The name of the method parameter to check.
      Returns:
      True if the parameter is defined, false otherwise.

    • getRuleItemStringWithString

      public AbstractConstraint.RuleItemSet getRuleItemStringWithString(String itemSetRule)
      Converts a string representation of a rule item set into the corresponding enum value.
      Parameters:
      itemSetRule - The string representation of the rule item set.
      Returns:
      The corresponding AbstractConstraint.RuleItemSet enum value.
